channel.title: Comments on: The International Year Of Sustainable Energy – Did you know

item.title: By: drpremrajpushpakaran
item.dc:creator: drpremrajpushpakaran
item.description:
It was an appropriate act from UN to commemorate the year 2012, as the International Year for Sustainable Energy for All. There is a huge demand for energy to supplement the needs of public, also novel, appropriate technology to tap and conserve it should be developed in a sustainable way.
Dr. Prem Raj Pushpakaran www.incredb.org/investigator.php?incredb_id=373&prev=prev
item.content:encoded:
It was an appropriate act from UN to commemorate the year 2012, as the International Year for Sustainable Energy for All. There is a huge demand for energy to supplement the needs of public, also novel, appropriate technology to tap and conserve it should be developed in a sustainable way.

Dr. Prem Raj Pushpakaran
http://www.incredb.org/investigator.php?incredb_id=373&prev=prev
